articles.title: Why GPT-4o’s sudden shutdown left people grieving
articles.summary: June had no idea that GPT-5 was coming.  The Norwegian student was enjoying a late-night writing session last Thursday when her ChatGPT collaborator started acting strange.
articles.content: June had no idea that GPT-5 was coming. The Norwegian student was enjoying a late-night writing session last Thursday when her ChatGPT collaborator started acting strange. “It started forgetting everything, and it wrote really badly,” she says. “It was like a robot.” June, who asked that we use only

articles.title: NVIDIA aims to solve AI’s issues with many languages
articles.summary: While AI might feel ubiquitous, it primarily operates in a tiny fraction of the world’s 7,000 languages, leaving a huge portion of the global population behind.  NVIDIA aims to fix this glaring .
articles.content: While AI might feel ubiquitous, it primarily operates in a tiny fraction of the world’s 7,000 languages, leaving a huge portion of the global population behind. articles.title: Cohere hires long-time Meta research head Joelle Pineau as its chief AI officer
articles.summary: Cohere has hired Joelle Pineau, Meta's former VP of AI research who previously oversaw the tech giant's fundamental AI research (FAIR) lab.  In her newly created Chief AI Officer role, Pineau will ove.
articles.content: Cohere has hired Joelle Pineau, Meta's former VP of AI research who previously oversaw the tech giant's fundamental AI research (FAIR) lab. In her newly created Chief AI Officer role, Pineau will oversee AI strategy across Cohere's research, product, and policy teams.
